body:
And [this discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/how-to-set-hb-generator-related-output-variables-and-how-to?page=1&commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1735775&x=1#2985220Comment1735775) answers the question about the HB)Generation. -A.
